channel.title: ansible on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Ansible (1)
item.description: I realize that it is about time to getting organized for my system setup in a way better than making notes and writing shell scripts. I decided to deploy Ansible for localhost only with CLI to help me get organized and learn Ansible. Since upstream Ansible documentation addresses more generic remote host usages and is too much to digest, this memo should be a good minimal use case for me to get started.
